name: Finding Albert - Feints (2013)
description:
In March 2013, Finding Albert release their album ‘Feints’ – follow up to their eponymous debut album, and the ‘Life & Times’ EP in 2012.

It’s proven a successful formulae for the Dumfries indie five-piece – coming out of nowhere in late 2011 to become regular festival performers, gaining major supports, radio and TV appearances, and most importantly, the building of a passionate and vocal support.

Their ‘Feints’ launch show in March sees them play to a huge home-crowd in Scotland, days before the group head off on their UK and Irish tour dates. The new album attempts to capture the energy and intensity of the live show, whilst retaining the musicianship and detailed arrangements that have won them so many followers to date.

The band plan to take on UK and European tour dates throughout 2013.

Features the new single "Disconnect"

name: Double Album + EP Bundle
description:
3 CD Deal, Exclusive to FindingAlbert.com

Includes: 

Finding Albert EP - "Life & Times"

"The three-track follow-up to their debut album consists of tracks 'Life & Times', 'Ida', and 'Smiler' - which will air exclusively on BBC Radio1 before released on iTunes, CD, etc. Dates TBC, watch this space.

The new EP has already been mooted as a step-up from their well-received debut album, which received glowing reviews from press across the UK."

Finding Albert - Debut Album, 2011

"Finding Albert's debut album, released July '11. Includes tracks 'Back To Rome', 'Madelyne' and 'My Friend Jack'.

"Retaining the sensibilities of a singer-songwriter with the power of a full band, it's impressive stuff. Their freshly squeezed self-titled album just oozes class... further enhanced by some glorious string arrangements..."

- Jim Gellatly, The Sun""

Finding Albert - Feints

"In March 2013, Finding Albert release their album ‘Feints’ – follow up to their eponymous debut album, and the ‘Life & Times’ EP in 2012.
